name: Mr Holohan
summary: Mr. Holohan is an assistant secretary of the Eire Abu Society who has been arranging a series of concerts in Dublin. He has a distinctive limp, earning him the nickname "Hoppy Holohan" from his friends. Mr. Holohan is involved in the daily activities of Madam Glynn, a woman from London, seeking her advice and assistance. He is also responsible for introducing Madam Glynn to the two young ladies. Mr. Holohan is described as having a game leg and feeling heated, possibly due to the stress of his responsibilities. Overall, Mr. Holohan is a hardworking and sociable character in the story.
